ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Too bad you re not on The Tribunal. I have my 39 cleric in Shadeweaver buffing every newbie in sight. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
Too bad you're not on The Tribunal. I have my 39 cleric in Shadeweaver
buffing every newbie in sight.
luv,
-Su

> hello,
>
> just joined you group,
>
>

> the fironia vie server. (Untwinked)i.e poor and newb equipment
>
> im pretty much a newb only been playing a month the only other place
> i have travelled is around gfay as an elf. so as everyone i meet in
> luclin seems to solo and are pretty much unfriendly overall, i would
> like to ask here if anyone would like to group for a coupla hours? or
> if anyone can offer advice?
>
> Calidin
